content.body: I'm fine with this, tho do we want to have it as part of the main proposal, or layered as a "next step"?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I'm fine with this, tho do we want to have it as part of the main proposal, or layered as a "next step"?

content.body: i think that's the biggest open question that blocks merging it, tbh
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: i think that's the biggest open question that blocks merging it, tbh

content.body: altho i do see an argument for `expr is pattern` (and the protocol, and the builtins' impls of that protocol) being a lower-level building block before the match construct itself
